block_comment: The block of code manages the decision logic for memory type selection other than "DDR2". It uses a built-in conditional check "if" anchored inside a "generate" statement to dynamically adjust synthesis in the design time, according to the memory type represented by the variable C_MEM_TYPE. This function is implemented by evaluating the string comparison between the variable C_MEM_TYPE and "DDR2", and the labeled block 'gen_cketrain_b' is instantiated when the memory type is not "DDR2".
